reviewText:
wow these were horrible! What a waste of money and worse yet time Ill never get back. I kept fast forwarding trying to find anything worth watching. Absolutely the worst of camera work. I don't know what they were thinking. I'm not watching this so the camera man can keep moving away from the action to show me the scenery!! I don't care was the grasslands look like get back to the girl!!

Then the Girls OMG! Man wish I could tell them "hey your acting SUCKS so stop trying to act like your hot cuz your not!!  These things went right in the Garbage where they belong.

Short-version of the review: THIS BUNDLE IS WELL WORTH THE PRICE!!! All the clips included on these DVDs are top-quality.

Continue reading for the long-version of the review.

The 3 DVDs included in this bundle are:
- All Girl Orgy Party (60 minutes long)
---------------------
The clips in "All Girl Orgy Party" include: a lesbian clip between models, Annabelle Lee and Smokie Flame and another lesbian clip between models, Annabelle Lee, Smokie Flame, and Tatyana. The rest of the DVD consists of nude video shoots of Annabelle Lee and Smokie along with an interview of both models.

- Kristi Curiali and Tatyana: My First Girl (71 minutes long)
-------------------------------------------
The clips in "My First Girl" include: a lesbian clip between models, Tatyana and Kristi (including a scene where a strap-on is used on Tatyana by Kristi!) and 2 clips where Tatyana masturbates (in the one clip, she does a very sexy striptease). Also, there is a nude video shoot featuring Kristi.

- Tatyana: Rough Masturbation (53 minutes long)
-----------------------------
The clips in "Rough Masturbation" all feature Tatyana masturbating in different areas. There are 5 clips in all.

Each clip features incredibly sexy women with excellent camera work!
Again, this bundle is WELL worth the price! A definite must-have for anyone who loves naked women!
